Class BufferedBitInput

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.jinahya.io.BitInput
      com.googlecode.jinahya.io.BufferedBitInput

public class BufferedBitInput
extends BitInput

A BitInput for a buffered bytes.

Author:
Jin Kwon
